channel.title: Experience-practicals on TongZheng's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Experience-practicals on TongZheng's Blog

item.title: experience
item.description: ABSTRACT Nanyue Ancient Path is the communication route between Lingnan and foreign regions, and has existed across periods throughout history. It is also known as the population migration corridor, the commodity exchange route and an ancient path making possible cultural exchange between civilizations. Considering the limitations in previous studies in this research area and ignoring narration, the current study introduces the narrative-space structural analytical method and views the Nanyue Ancient Path as a narrative that can be used to reveal its cultural connotations and characteristics.
